title: A Machine Learning Ensemble Model for the Detection of Cyberbullying
abstract: arXiv:2402.12538v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: The pervasive use of social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, and X, has significantly amplified our electronic interconnectedness. Moreover, these platforms are now easily accessible from any location at any given time. However, the increased popularity of social media has also led to cyberbullying.It is imperative to address the need for finding, monitoring, and mitigating cyberbullying posts on social media platforms. Motivated by this necessity, we present this paper to contribute to developing an automated system for detecting binary labels of aggressive tweets.Our study has demonstrated remarkable performance compared to previous experiments on the same dataset. We employed the stacking ensemble machine learning method, utilizing four various feature extraction techniques to optimize performance within the stacking ensemble learning framework. tldr: 该研究使用堆叠集成机器学习方法结合多种特征提取技术，成功开发出用于检测网络欺凌的自动化系统，并在性能上表现出色。
